metadata.title: CVE-2017-14930 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Memory leak in decode_line_info in dwarf2.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.30-2ubuntu1').
